front.title: Performance Measurement Using UDP Path for Segment Routing Networks

abstract.t: Segment Routing (SR) is applicable to both Multiprotocol Label Switching (SR-MPLS) and IPv6 (SRv6) data planes. This document specifies procedures for using UDP path for sending and processing synthetic probe query and response messages for Performance Measurement (PM). The procedure uses the RFC 6374 defined mechanisms for Performance Delay and Loss Measurement. The procedure specified is applicable to SR-MPLS and SRv6 data planes for both links and end-to-end measurement for SR Policies. In addition, this document defines Return Path TLV for two-way performance measurement and Block Number TLV for loss measurement.
